channel.title: UI on Rokcso's blog
channel.description: Recent content in UI on Rokcso's blog

item.title: 译> 重构 UI
item.description: 本文由 AI 翻译，人工修正。 原文链接：https://www.refactoringui.com/ Starting from Scratch / 从零开始 Start with a feature, not a layout / 始于功能，而非布局 When you start the design for a new app idea, what do you design first? If it’s the navigation bar at the top of the page, you’re making a mistake. 在开始设计一个新应用时，如果你首先着手于页面顶部的导航栏，这其实是一个误区。 The easiest way to find yourself frustrated and stuck when working on a new design is to start by trying to “design the app.
